allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Initial commit: WHS5 - Workplace Health & Safety System

- Laravel 12 + Vuexy theme integration
- Complete WHS module implementation (Incidents, Risk Assessments, Emergency Response, Vehicles, Journeys, CAPA, Warehouse Equipment, Inspections, Contractors, Documents, Compliance, Safety Inspections, Training, Teams, PermitToWork)
- Analytics Dashboard with comprehensive metrics
- Multi-branch support system
- Deployment scripts for Hostinger VPS
- Database migrations and seeders
- API Resources and Services layer
- Role-based permission system (Spatie)

Ready for deployment to whs.rotechrural.site")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i /d/WHS5/whs5_deployment_key root@147.79.66.172 "cd /var/www/whs 2>/dev/null && pwd && git log -1 --oneline 2>/dev/null || echo ''Directory not yet ready''")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i /d/WHS5/whs5_deployment_key root@147.79.66.172 "ps aux | grep -E ''(git|composer|npm|php artisan)'' | grep -v grep | head -10")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i /d/WHS5/whs5_deployment_key root@147.79.66.172 "which node && which npm && node --version && npm --version 2>&1 || echo ''Node.js/NPM not found in PATH''")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList ''-NoExit'', ''-Command'', ''cd D:\WHS5; php artisan serve --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8002'' -WindowStyle Minimized")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process -Id 21136 | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, Path | Format-List")
